title: I'm so much interested in computer science and information technology. How could I start? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh man, is THIS an open ended question. So, first, pick what you want to learn about. IT and CS have so many subfields it’s crazy. For starters hit up a website like Codecademy - learn to code, interactively, for free and learn to write in a language. Any language, really. You just want to get an idea for how programming works and computers think. Additionally, read a book like the Mike Meyer’s guides for the CompTIA A+, Network+, and Security+. These books will give you a really general overview (and prepare you for certifications) of the core facets of IT. After that the sky is the limit, friend.

Great Question! Many wonder this question, but few actually take action, because they will give up. If you are student, take computer science classes, otherwise go online and learn computer science, learn programming, and get certified in programming languages. Hope this Helped!
